name: lb-foundation-template
description: Template to test Foundation CSS specification
author: Lichtblick

scripts.build: yarn run build:fn && yarn run build:lb
scripts.build:fn: node-sass assets/scss/foundation.scss -o assets/css --output-style compressed && postcss --use autoprefixer -r assets/css/foundation.css --no-map
scripts.build:lb: node-sass assets/scss/lichtblick.scss -o assets/css --output-style compressed && postcss --use autoprefixer -r assets/css/foundation.css --no-map
